Article.ArticleTitle: Impaired systemic oxygen extraction long after mild COVID-19: potential perioperative implications.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology, Applied Hemodynamics, Yale School of Medicine, New Haven, CT, USA. Electronic address: paul.heerdt@yale.edu.
